activities: Corporations, Foundations, and Charitable Organizations, as well as end users utilize our software to facilitate grant requests, event registration, transactions, matching charitable gifts, and charitable by any member of our user-base.  Data stored on our system is strictly limited to name, address, email, employee number (if provided by employer for matching-gift purposes) and telephone number (if provided by end-user).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: name, address, including telephone number if desired and  employee number as provided by employer or end user.  Data is not manually processed, records are electronically submitted to us, and processing on our end is automated.
privacyprograms: all company servers and data storage devices abide by PCI level 2 compliance standards.
recoursemech: Anyone having concern with the compliance of SnapSolutions, LLC, with the Safe Harbor framework should notify the Security Director in writing at Security Director, PO Box 5076, Vernon Hills, IL  60061 or at security@donationx.org, security@events.org, or security@charitygiving.org.  Appropriate steps will be taken by management to resolve any complaints.
